dialogue.text: Oh hi, I didn't see you there. I don't think we've met. Press enter to talk to me.

dialogue.name: Elon Musk
dialogue.text: My name is Elon Musk, but my friends just call me Elon.

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: One of my employees was tragically found dead this morning. One of my best employees, mind you.

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: That's right. I'm talking about Dr. Bob. And I think it was murder.

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: And unfortunately, all evidence points to the culprit being one of my best friends...

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: So, you're going to help me sleuth this out, okay?

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: And once you think you know who it is... select Solve the Case in the menu.
